item.title: Jim Wise - Introducing Me - Baritone Ukulele
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for DGBE ukulele. Key of C.
Chords Used: C, G, Am, F, Dm, D, Em
Suggested Strumming Pattern: Fast 8 XDXDXDXUDU (X=skip not a chunk or chuck)
As performed by Nick Jonas. Requested by "Someone Random" on a comment on this YouTube channel.
Tutorial Video (GCEA): https://youtu.be/MiCPVPG362s
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is based on Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com (this version of the Baritone font is not).
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
And please visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (free).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.
